diff_act: 2.choose type of data to be archived

regen.absent_element: data restoration mechanism from archived data
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide a mechanism to restore archived data based on user selection.
The system shall provide a mechanism to delete archived data when it is no longer needed.

regen.absent_element: mechanism to prevent accidental overwriting of archived data during restoration
regen.new_specification: The system shall implement a confirmation step before restoring archived data to prevent accidental overwriting of existing data.

label: The user shall be able to restore the archived data.
absence: action of restoring the archived data
